name: Number Jump
description:
3D puzzle-platformer where you try to reach the goal by jumping on correct numbers and forming a correct equation.

Made by:

Elias Saarenpää: https://www.linkedin.com/in/elias-saarenp%C3%A4%C3%A4/

Miko Grönroos: https://www.linkedin.com/in/miko-gr%C3%B6nroos-84154a209/
